EndPoints.Description: EndPoint for adding new pet to the MongoDB Database

Body_Example.name: pets_name
Body_Example.obs: Pure text with observations about the pet; conditions; diseases; etc.

EndPoints.Return: Null. Status code should indicate if operation was successfull (200), or if it wasn't (406 or 500), in this case, the body will bring error message.
EndPoints.Important: Owner's user must exists in the database, otherwise status code must be 406 (not acceptable) and the pet won't be added.
